title: Disney Junior Wonderful World of Songs
overview: These musical shorts for preschoolers celebrate the heritage of Disney with classic characters and songs from beloved movies, series and attractions that highlight the wonder and magic of the iconic brand. Performed by popular musical artists Rob Cantor and Genevieve Goings ("Disney Junior Nursery Rhymes"), the shorts feature reimagined versions of classic songs, including "Circle of Life" from "The Lion King," "You Can Fly!" from "Peter Pan," "How Far I'll Go" from "Moana" and "It's A Small World."
